title: As Stocks Dropped, Different Approaches to Investing Cash
text:
The stock market’s sharp drop on Monday presented an opportunity—but also a risk—for advisers with clients looking to invest a large chunk of cash from an inheritance, home sale or other life event.
Stocks were clearly on sale, but advisers knew that if prices were to fall a lot further over subsequent days or weeks, purchases might not look savvy.
